product_name: Atomic Waymaker Tour 100 W Randonee Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: With lugged soles and hike/ski modes, the lightweight women's Atomic Waymaker Tour 100 W randonee boots also feature powerful carbon reinforcements to help you shred descents in the backcountry.
short_description: With lugged soles and hike/ski modes, the lightweight women's Atomic Waymaker Tour 100 W randonee boots also feature powerful carbon reinforcements to help you shred descents in the backcountry.
